roleset_name: growth rate inverse to exponentiation (b to the y power equals x, with y being the log of x, logarithmic to x)

roles.descr: logarithmic thing (includes the log, which is the number of times arg2 is multiplied against itself, or y in the above equation)
the base (number multiplied by itself arg1 times, b in the above equation)
the antilogarithm (result when arg3 is multiplied by itself arg2 times, number the log is 'of', x in the above equation)
